Name: South Tarawa
Description: South Tarawa is the capital and the most populous region of Kiribati. It serves as the political, cultural, and economic hub of the country.

Name: North Tarawa
Description: North Tarawa is part of the Tarawa atoll and is less developed compared to South Tarawa. It is known for its pristine environment and traditional lifestyle.

Name: Phoenix Islands
Description: The Phoenix Islands are a group of islands in the central Pacific Ocean, known for their coral reefs and protected marine areas.

Name: Line Islands
Description: The Line Islands are an isolated group of islands stretching across the Pacific, famous for their biodiversity and unspoiled natural beauty.
